name: atom.ic
description:
You play as the most micro thing of all -- an atom, trying to avoid the dangerous electrons of nearby atoms while absorbing their tasty nuclei. As you absorb atoms, you transform into new elements.

Played entirely with the mouse. Hold down left click to charge up, then release to dash in the direction you're aiming. Hit the nucleus of an atom to absorb it, but if you hit its orbiting electrons, you die!

Made with Game Maker Studio 2 in 2 hours, 55 minutes. Design and code by Levi Pinkert. Logo and playtesting by Ella Pinkert. Sounds downloaded from ZapSplat.
